choices: At your crazy teacher mr Crocker’s house
On mark the aliens homeplanet yukopatamia
At your princeable mrs. Waxoplaxe’s house
1.content: You wake up after your alarm clock goes off. You stretch after getting out of your bed. “Man that was a good nights sleep” you say to yourself. Wanda and cosmo then poof into the room. “Good morning Timmy” they both say in unison. You say “good morning” back to them. Cosmo then asks “what should we do today Timmy” shaking his hands like he can’t hold in his excitement. “I know I will make my first wish of the day” Wanda then says “I don’t know sport what if cosmo gets this one roung like last time” Wanda says shaking nervacely. You then tell Wanda “ it will be fine I’m shure cosmo has learned from his mistake and won’t do it again” “right cosmo” you ask him. He says “you bet ya Timmy” you then begin to say “I wish” but you are interrupted by cosmo who says “I know exactly what you are going to say Timmy” he then waves his wand and Wanda tries to stop him. But before she can cosmo casts the wish. You then disappear. When you can see again you realize your can’t move. You think in your head “cosmo you idiot” you then realize you are a inanimate object. But where are you?
1.title: Starting off the day with a wish

13.content: You then realize you’ve turned into a object on the alien planet yukopatamia. You can’t see anything you hear someone talking. The thing that is blocking your view is removed and you realize the person who was talking was. Who was talking?
13.title: On mark the aliens homeplanet yukopatamia

choices: A body part of mark Chang’s mother
131.content: You then see mark Chang’s mother. She is looking down at you. What have you become?
131.title: Queen Jipjorrulac/mark Chang’s mother

1311.content: You then feel yourself moving as mark Chang’s mother moves. You then realize you have become a body part of mark Chang’s mother. But what body part of her body have you become?
1311.title: A body part of mark Chang’s mother

14.content: You realize your a inanimate object at your princeable mrs. Waxoplax’s house. You can’t see anything she then finds you and looks at you. what type of object are you?
14.title: At your princeable mrs. Waxoplaxe’s house

info.description:
You are the main character of the show fairly odd parents, Timmy turner you make a wish that backfires becouse of cosmo and now you are a inanimate object Eather in your house, somewhere in fairy world, or at the school.

(Rules)
#1 (no death of the main character)
#2 (don’t get to sexual in the story)
#3 (don’t make this a interally different story)
#4 (no cussing)
